Text: Sir you are a Gentleman thank you very much for this download I wonder if you could get his other novels 1862, 1945, (what if the japan had not given up so easily in 1945) 1942,(hawali had been invaded by japan after pearl habour) and castros bomb, (if castro had taken over guantamo bay in 1962)and 1862.(if the British had allied themselves with the South in the American Civil war.) Again with much thanks and best wishes bookguy
